statements: SELECT * FROM BoxingEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM BoxingEvents;
SELECT event_name, venue_id, capacity FROM BoxingEvents WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM BoxingEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, venue_id, capacity FROM BoxingEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC, venue_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BoxingEvents WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM BoxingEvents WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM BoxingEvents WHERE venue_id = 3 AND capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT event_name, venue_id FROM BoxingEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-09-01' AND capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY venue_id, event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BoxingEvents WHERE event_time BETWEEN '15:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM venue;
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity FROM venue;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_id FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event WHERE venue_id = 2;
SELECT venue_name FROM venue WHERE venue_capacity > 100 ORDER BY venue_name ASC
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity, event_name FROM venue JOIN event ON venue.venue_id = event.venue_id WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM venue JOIN event ON venue.venue_id = event.venue_id WHERE venue_name LIKE '%center%'
SELECT MAX(venue_capacity) AS max_capacity, MIN(venue_capacity) AS min_capacity FROM venue
SELECT * FROM Venue;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Venue;
SELECT * FROM BoxingEvent ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM BoxingEvent WHERE venue_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, booking_date FROM Booking ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Venue;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Venue WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM BoxingEvent WHERE venue_id = 3 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, customer_name FROM Booking WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01' AND booking_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, event_name FROM Booking b JOIN BoxingEvent e ON b.event_id = e.event_id WHERE b.customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY booking_id;
SELECT * FROM venues;
SELECT name, address FROM venues ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, address FROM venues WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT fighters.name, fighters.weight_class, bookings.booking_date FROM fighters INNER JOIN bookings ON fighters.id = bookings.fighter_id;
SELECT * FROM venues ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM venues WHERE id = 1;
SELECT events.name, venues.name FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.id;
SELECT fighters.name, bookings.booking_date FROM fighters JOIN bookings ON fighters.id = bookings.fighter_id;
SELECT * FROM venues WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Venue WHERE venue_location='New York';
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Venue ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT event_date, start_time, end_time FROM Event WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class FROM Boxer WHERE weight_class='Middleweight' AND boxer_name LIKE '%son%';
SELECT booking_id, spectator_name, booking_date FROM Booking ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Venue;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Venue ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class FROM Boxer WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight';
SELECT event_date, start_time, end_time FROM Event WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT boxer_name AS Winner, score FROM Boxer INNER JOIN Match ON boxer_id = winner_id
